events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store but would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The system has identified this issue as a refund request based on the customer's message content.
The refund support agent has been assigned to assist with the refund request for order #562738.
Hello! I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed, could you also confirm if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way since delivery?
Thank you for responding. The order number is 789654123. The jacket is brand new; I tried it on once but did not wear it outside.
We can initiate the refund process for you immediately. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email shortly.
Thanks for the quick solution! I appreciate the free return label and look forward to the refund once the item is received.
We've sent you the return label via email. Once we receive the jacket, a full refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have returned your jacket and to let you know the refund has been processed successfully.
Your refund case is now closed. Thank you for shopping with us, and feel free to reach out if you need any further assistance.
